author: Reuters Editorial
title: U.S. may need to extend social distancing for virus until 2022, study says
description: The United States may need to endure social distancing measures adopted during the coronavirus outbreak until 2022, according to researchers at the Harvard School of Public Health.
content:
(Reuters) - The United States may need to endure social distancing measures adopted during the coronavirus outbreak until 2022, according to researchers at the Harvard School of Public Health. 
The study comes as more than 2,200 people died in the United Sta… [+1411 chars]
